fields.title: Gaussian variable elimination
fields.pointers:
* If we run multiple queries, variable elimination involves redundant computations.  [Belief propagation](gaussian_bp_on_trees)  gives a way of sharing these computations. 
*  [Kalman smoothing](kalman_as_bp)  can be seen as a special case of Gaussian BP.
*  [Gaussian variable elimination](gaussian_variable_elimination_as_gaussian_elimination)  is equivalent to Gaussian elimination.
fields.summary: Marginalization in Gaussian MRFs can be performed in cubic time by inverting a matrix, but this is too slow for some applications. If the model has the right structure, variable elimination can result in a big speedup.
